page.title: 04Occupations in Warbleton
page.content: Although Warbleton is a rural area only a small minority of families depend on the land, as farmers, game- keepers or horticulturalists, for their livelihood. These are often the ones whose families have lived in the area for many generations. Warbleton has become a residential area for people with a wide range of occupations. Some are unskilled workers, but there are several self- employed skilled workers such as plumbers, builders or sweeps. In addition there are businessmen, social workers, teachers, professors, doctors and surgeons. Many travel some distance to work, a few even as far as London. Unemployment is not a problem in this area but it is a home for many retired people.
